product_name: Teva Barracuda Sport Sandals - Toddler Boys'
long_description: Durably designed for playing in the water, the toddler boys' Teva Barracuda Sport Sandals include injection-molded EVA for unparalleled comfort and Durabrasion Rubber(TM) soles for grip. Plus, simple strapping ensures that your young one will have no trouble getting in and out of these kicks. Durabrasion Rubber(TM) provides durable traction. Open toe construction doesn't allow water to pool; synthetic uppers don't absorb water. Adjustable ankle straps personalize the fit. Rip-and-stick straps eliminate the hassle of laces. Lightweight foam in the midsoles offers a barefootlike feel. Teva Barracuda Sport Sandals have multiple points of adjustment to give your kid the perfect fit.
short_description: Durably designed for playing in the water, the toddler boys' Teva Barracuda Sport Sandals include injection-molded EVA for unparalleled comfort and Durabrasion Rubber(TM) soles for grip.
